oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Dia!kwain (David Hoesar) (V)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Stars and game behave in a similar way: when an animal is wounded the stars arouse its heart and make it want to walk. 1) p.5679v: Dia!kwain heard this story from his mother (=kamme-an), 2) Date on p.5688: 10 December, 3) This story is found in Book V-21.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Stars and game
